verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor, A Psalm לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <WH623> le-'A-Saf of Asaph אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֡ים <WH430> 'elo-Him O God בָּ֤אוּ <WH935> Ba-'u are come גוֹיִ֨ם׀ <WH1471> go-Yim the heathen בְּֽנַחֲלָתֶ֗ךָ <WH5159> be-na-cha-la-Te-cha, into thine inheritance טִ֭מְּאוּ <WH2930> Tim-me-'u have they defiled אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> hei-Chal temple קָדְשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH6944> kod-She-cha thy holy שָׂ֖מוּ <WH7760> Sa-mu they have laid אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְרוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem לְעִיִּֽים׃ <WH5856> le-'i-Yim. on heaps

נָֽתְנ֡וּ <WH5414> na-te-Nu have they given אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נִבְלַ֬ת <WH5038> niv-Lat The dead bodies עֲבָדֶ֗יךָ <WH5650> 'a-va-Dei-cha, of thy servants מַ֭אֲכָל <WH3978> Ma-'a-chol [to be] meat לְע֣וֹף <WH5775> le-'of unto the fowls הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of the heaven בְּשַׂ֥ר <WH1320> be-Sar the flesh חֲ֝סִידֶ֗יךָ <WH2623> cha-si-Dei-cha, of thy saints לְחַיְתוֹ־ <WH2416> le-chay-tov- unto the beasts אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> 'A-retz. of the earth

שָׁפְכ֬וּ <WH8210> sha-fe-Chu have they shed דָמָ֨ם׀ <WH1818> da-Mam Their blood כַּמַּ֗יִם <WH4325> kam-Ma-yim, like water סְֽבִ֘יב֤וֹת <WH5439> se-Vi-Vot round about יְֽרוּשָׁלִָ֗ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, Jerusalem וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> ve-'Ein and there קוֹבֵֽר׃ <WH6912> ko-Ver. and [there was] none to bury

הָיִ֣ינוּ <WH1961> ha-Yi-nu have חֶ֭רְפָּה <WH2781> Cher-pah We are become a reproach לִשְׁכֵנֵ֑ינוּ <WH7934> lish-che-Nei-nu; to our neighbours לַ֥עַג <WH3933> La-'ag a scorn וָ֝קֶ֗לֶס <WH7047> va-Ke-les, and derision לִסְבִיבוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5439> lis-vi-vo-Tei-nu. to them that are round about

עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- long מָ֣ה <WH4100> mah How יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh Jehovah תֶּאֱנַ֣ף <WH599> te-'e-Naf be angry לָנֶ֑צַח <WH5331> la-Ne-tzach; alway תִּבְעַ֥ר <WH1197> tiv-'Ar burn כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> ke-mov- like אֵ֝֗שׁ <WH784> 'Esh, burning קִנְאָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH7068> kin-'a-Te-cha. envy

שְׁפֹ֤ךְ <WH8210> she-Foch Pour out חֲמָתְךָ֨ <WH2534> cha-ma-te-Cha thy wrath אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- upon הַגּוֹיִם֮ <WH1471> hag-go-Yim upon the heathen אֲשֶׁ֪ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not יְדָ֫ע֥וּךָ <WH3045> ye-Da-'U-cha that have not known וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> ve-'Al and upon מַמְלָכ֑וֹת <WH4467> mam-la-Chot; thee and upon the kingdoms אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בְּ֝שִׁמְךָ֗ <WH8034> be-shim-cha, upon thy name לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not קָרָֽאוּ׃ <WH7121> ka-Ra-'u. that have not called

כִּ֭י <WH3588> ki for אָכַ֣ל <WH398> 'a-Chal For they have devoured אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko; Jacob וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et נָוֵ֥הוּ <WH5116> na-Ve-hu his dwelling place הֵשַֽׁמּוּ׃ <WH8074> he-Sham-mu. and laid waste אַֽל־ <WH408> 'al- nay תִּזְכָּר־ <WH2142> tiz-kor- burn

לָנוּ֮ la-Nu עֲוֹנֹ֪ת <WH5771> 'a-vo-Not iniquities רִאשֹׁ֫נִ֥ים <WH7223> ri-Sho-Nim not against us former מַ֭הֵר <WH4118> Ma-her speedily יְקַדְּמ֣וּנוּ <WH6923> ye-kad-de-Mu-nu prevent רַחֲמֶ֑יךָ <WH7356> ra-cha-Mei-cha; let thy tender mercies כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for דַלּ֣וֹנוּ <WH1809> dal-Lo-nu low מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. very

עָזְרֵ֤נוּ׀ <WH5826> 'a-ze-Re-nu Help אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <WH430> 'e-Lo-Hei us O God יִשְׁעֵ֗נוּ <WH3468> yish-'E-nu, of our salvation עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> de-Var for כְּבֽוֹד־ <WH3519> ke-Vod- the glory שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> she-Me-cha; of thy name וְהַצִּילֵ֥נוּ <WH5337> ve-hatz-tzi-Le-nu and deliver וְכַפֵּ֥ר <WH3722> ve-chap-Per us and purge away עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and חַ֝טֹּאתֵ֗ינוּ <WH2403> chat-to-Tei-nu, our sins לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an sake שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> she-Me-cha. for thy name's

לָ֤מָּה׀ <WH4100> Lam-mah Why יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> yo-me-Ru say הַגּוֹיִם֮ <WH1471> hag-go-Yim Wherefore should the heathen אַיֵּ֪ה <WH346> 'ai-Yeh Where אֱ‍ ֽלֹהֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <WH430> 'elo-Hei-Hem angels יִוָּדַ֣ע <WH3045> yiv-va-Da' acknowledge; בַּגִּיִּים bag-gi-yim כבַּגֹּויִ֣ם <WH1471> bag-go-Yim the nations קלְעֵינֵ֑ינוּ <WH5869> le-'ei-Nei-nu; in our sight נִ֝קְמַ֗ת <WH5360> nik-Mat, [by] the revenging דַּֽם־ <WH1818> dam- of the blood עֲבָדֶ֥יךָ <WH5650> 'a-va-Dei-cha of thy servants הַשָּׁפֽוּךְ׃ <WH8210> hash-sha-Fuch. [which is] shed

תָּ֤ב֣וֹא <WH935> ta-Vo come לְפָנֶיךָ֮ <WH6440> le-fa-nei-Cha before אֶנְקַ֪ת <WH603> 'en-Kat Let the sighing אָ֫סִ֥יר <WH616> 'a-Sir prisoner כְּגֹ֥דֶל <WH1433> ke-Go-del thee according to the greatness זְרוֹעֲךָ֑ <WH2220> ze-ro-'a-Cha; of thy power ה֝וֹתֵ֗ר <WH3498> ho-Ter, preserve בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei thou those that are appointed תְמוּתָֽה׃ <WH8546> te-mu-Tah. to die

וְהָ֘שֵׁ֤ב <WH7725> ve-Ha-Shev And render לִשְׁכֵנֵ֣ינוּ <WH7934> lish-che-Nei-nu unto our neighbours שִׁ֭בְעָתַיִם <WH7659> ve-'a-ta-yim sevenfold אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into חֵיקָ֑ם <WH2436> chei-Kam; into their bosom חֶרְפָּ֘תָ֤ם <WH2781> cher-Pa-Tam their reproach אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which חֵרְפ֣וּךָ <WH2778> che-re-Fu-cha wherewith they have reproached אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <WH136> 'a-do-Nai. thee O Lord

וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ <WH587> va-'a-Nach-nu we עַמְּךָ֨׀ <WH5971> 'am-me-Cha So we thy people וְצֹ֥אן <WH6629> ve-Tzon and sheep מַרְעִיתֶךָ֮ <WH4830> mar-'i-te-Cha of thy pasture נ֤וֹדֶ֥ה <WH3034> no-Deh will give thee thanks לְּךָ֗ le-Cha, לְע֫וֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam for ever לְדֹ֥ר <WH1755> le-Dor to all וָדֹ֑ר <WH1755> va-Dor; generations נְ֝סַפֵּ֗ר <WH5608> ne-sap-Per, we will shew forth תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8416> te-hil-la-Te-cha. thy praise
